headline: American International Group (NYSE:AIG) To Redeem US$236 Million Debt In June 2025
summary: Following American International Group's (NYSE:AIG) announcement of the full redemption of its 3.900% Notes Due 2026, the company's stock price moved 12% over the past quarter. This during a period where market indexes, such as the S&P 500 and Dow Jones, saw gains amid broader economic confidence and reductions in U.S.-China trade tariffs. AIG's increase in dividend and large-scale share buybacks may have added weight to this uptrend by enhancing investor appeal. Despite its reduced earnings,...
